result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
result.translation: 58.Nabii Mucammadowﷺ tama Nabii Qiisä caagidik kol nakriyeeh kol maaqnam Baxxaqqa itta Astootiy ku-Nubuwwannu tascassee kee Qhuraanay diggi ittam Addal как taniy cakkii kee deedal ittak Baxsa Agay-waaga mali usuk Yallih xaquk yanim.
